widgets.title: Server Locations
widgets.nrql: from SystemSample   select    filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance' ) AS 'Total Servers',    filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider IS NULL) AS 'On-Premises Servers',   filter(uniquecount(hostname), WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance') AS 'AWS Servers'

widgets.title: Server Locations
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts'  FACET cases(  WHERE provider IS NULL as 'On-Premises',      WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' as 'AWS')

widgets.title: Apps per Server : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: from Transaction select uniqueCount(appName) as 'Apps' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' facet host

widgets.title: Apps per Server : AWS
widgets.nrql: from Transaction select uniqueCount(appName) as 'Apps'  WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' facet host

widgets.title: OS Types : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts'  WHERE provider IS NULL FACET operatingSystem

widgets.title: OS Types : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts' WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' FACET operatingSystem

widgets.title: OS Types: Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts' WHERE provider IS NULL OR  provider = 'Ec2Instance' FACET operatingSystem

widgets.title: Processor Count: On Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts'  FACET processorCount   WHERE provider IS NULL

widgets.title: Processor Count : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname)  AS 'Hosts' FACET processorCount   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'

widgets.title: Processor Count: Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT uniqueCount(hostname) AS 'Hosts'   FACET processorCount  WHERE provider IS NULL    OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'

widgets.title: Disk Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM StorageSample SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as 'Percent Full'   WHERE provider IS NULL SINCE 1 MINUTE AGO

widgets.title: Disk Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM StorageSample SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as 'Percent Full'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' SINCE 1 MINUTE AGO

widgets.title: Disk Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM StorageSample SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as 'Percent Full'  WHERE provider IS NULL  OR provider = 'Ec2Instance' SINCE 1 MINUTE AGO

widgets.title: Server Statistics : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample, NetworkSample  SELECT  latest(coreCount) as 'Core Count',  max(cpuPercent) as 'Peak CPU %',  average(cpuPercent) as 'Avg CPU %',  latest(operatingSystem) as 'OS',  latest(processorCount) as 'Processor Count',  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Total Storage',  max(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Peak Storage %',  average(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Avg Storage %',  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Memory Installed',  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Avg Memory %',  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Peak Memory %',  average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Avg Network Usage',  max(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Peak Network Usage'  WHERE provider IS NULL FACET hostname

widgets.title: Server Statistics : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample, NetworkSample  SELECT  latest(coreCount) as 'Core Count',  max(cpuPercent) as 'Peak CPU %',  average(cpuPercent) as 'Avg CPU %',  latest(operatingSystem) as 'OS',  latest(processorCount) as 'Processor Count',  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Total Storage',  max(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Peak Storage %',  average(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Avg Storage %',  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Memory Installed',  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Avg Memory %',  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Peak Memory %',  average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Avg Network Usage',  max(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Peak Network Usage'  WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance' FACET hostname

widgets.title: Server Statistics : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample, NetworkSample  SELECT  latest(coreCount) as 'Core Count',  max(cpuPercent) as 'Peak CPU %',  average(cpuPercent) as 'Avg CPU %',  latest(operatingSystem) as 'OS',  latest(processorCount) as 'Processor Count',  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Total Storage',  max(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Peak Storage %',  average(diskUtilizationPercent) as 'Avg Storage %',  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'Memory Installed',  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Avg Memory %',  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes) as 'Peak Memory %',  average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Avg Network Usage',  max(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Peak Network Usage'  WHERE provider IS NULL    OR provider = 'Ec2Instance' FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak CPU Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT  max(cpuPercent) as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak CPU Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT  max(cpuPercent) as '%'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak CPU Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT  max(cpuPercent) as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL    OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average CPU Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average CPU Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '%' WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average CPU Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample   SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL    OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Storage Installed  : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'GB'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Storage Installed : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'GB'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Storage Installed : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskTotalBytes)/1073741824as 'GB'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Storage Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(diskUtilizationPercent)*100  as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Storage Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(diskUtilizationPercent)  as '%'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'    FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Storage Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(diskUtilizationPercent)  as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL    OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Storage Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskUtilizationPercent)  as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Storage Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskUtilizationPercent)  as '%'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Storage Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(diskUtilizationPercent)  as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Memory Installed : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'GB'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Memory Installed : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'GB'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Total Memory Installed : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryTotalBytes)/1073741824 as 'GB'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Memory Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Memory Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Memory Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Memory Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Memory Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Memory Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM SystemSample  SELECT  max(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes)*100   as '%'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Network Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  average(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Network Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  average(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Average Network Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  average(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Network Utilization : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  max(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider IS NULL   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Network Utilization : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  max(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider = 'Ec2Instance'   FACET hostname

widgets.title: Top Peak Network Utilization : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM NetworkSample  SELECT  max(transmitBytesPerSecond)/1024   as 'MB/s'   WHERE provider IS NULL OR provider = 'Ec2Instance'  FACET hostname
